heading: Diablo 4 Endgame Update and Server Slam Event
content: is here with a ton of new information! (Game Director) (Associate Game Director) and (Community Lead) took part in a livestream hosted by which provided new updates on the endgame and Open Beta learnings! Let's break down all that we learned during the livestream! A special, third Diablo 4 play test weekend has been added for one last taste of Diablo 4 before release! You can earn the same three rewards from the previous Open Beta along with a new Trophy item this weekend: is growing and will be hacking and slashing the demon hoards when DIablo 4 launches in June!
